addr: World Room, Journalism. West 116th Street and Broadway. New York, New York 10025
title: Tree Lighting Winter Celebration - CC Students
desc: Join fellow Columbia College students and alumni for the Winter Celebration after the Tree Lighting Ceremony. Celebrate with classmates and alumni as College Walk's trees light up, then meet other Columbians at the Journalism School's World Room for food, drinks, mingling and more musical performances. CC students only. Guests must be CC students, as well. Entrance is on a first-come, first-served basis with registration.
